body_html:
@jlebar I notice that from TF 1.12 that it will be built with XLA by default.

Is this really a good idea with a bug such as this is still unsolved?

It builds with XLA, it doesn't run with XLA by default. I'm quite unhappy with this bug still being around, but failed to ever reproduce the crash you're seeing.
body:
> @jlebar I notice that from TF 1.12 that it will be built with XLA by default.
> 
> Is this really a good idea with a bug such as this is still unsolved?

It *builds* with XLA, it doesn't *run* with XLA by default. I'm quite unhappy with this bug still being around, but failed to ever reproduce the crash you're seeing.
